mobile_page.desktop_too_narrow: The Builder doesn't work on this resolution! Try making this window wider if you can.
mobile_page.gallery_title: Check out work from Builder users!
mobile_page.message: The Builder is only available on desktop right now. Sign up to receive updates and check it out on your computer.
mobile_page.reminder_body:
Hey there!

Whoops! It looks like you tried to use the Builder from a mobile device!
The Builder only runs on desktop and laptop computers. Grab your nearest computer, and try again at https://builder.decentraland.org

Happy building!

The Decentraland Team

secondary_hero.title: Want to build something when you get to your computer?

mobile_page.success: Thanks, we will keep you posted!

land_assign_ens_page.title: Assign {name}
land_assign_ens_page.subtitle: Assign a name to {land}
land_assign_ens_page.set_name_message: In order to set this name to your parcel you first need to send 2 transactions.
land_assign_ens_page.set_resolver_explanation: The Resolver is a Smart Contract responsible for the process of translating names into addresses.
land_assign_ens_page.set_content_explanation: The Content is a hash refering a redirection to your land page that will be saved on your Resolver.

migrate_page.step_one_message_line_one: In order to provide a seamless experience across our products, we have switched the Builder's account system from email to wallet based. This means that you will need to connect an Ethereum wallet to store your scenes in the Cloud. If you don't have a wallet you can learn more about how to get one {link}.
migrate_page.step_one_message_line_two: If you had Scenes stored in your email account, you can migrate them to your wallet account using this page.
migrate_page.step_two_message: Please login with your email account to find the Scenes that need to be migrated.
migrate_page.step_three_message: Please connect your wallet to continue. If you don't have a wallet here's a {link} to get one.
migrate_page.step_three_error: Please install {metamask} or other Ethereum wallet to continue
migrate_page.step_four_message: Migrate all Scenes and asset packs under your email account into your wallet account.
migrate_page.projects_title: The following Scenes will be migrated:

transaction.edit_estate_add: You added {count} {count, plural, one {parcel} other {parcels}} to {name}.
transaction.edit_estate_remove: You removed {count} {count, plural, one {parcel} other {parcels}} from {name}.
transaction.set_manager_assigned: You assigned {address} as operator of all your {type}.
transaction.set_manager_revoked: You revoked {address} as operator of all your {type}.

transaction.removed_collection_managers: Removed {count} {count, plural, one {collaborator} other {collaborators}} for the collection {name}

slide0.description: This is Decentraland’s new Scene builder. Before you get started, let us show you around.
slide0.title: Welcome to the Builder!

slide2.description: Add objects to your Scene from the sidebar on the right.

slide3.description: Rotate objects by clicking on the Rotate tool and dragging the orbits.

slide4.description: Drag with the left button to rotate the camera. Use the right button to pan.

collection_detail_page.set_on_sale_popup: This will allow your collection to be sold on in-world vending machines.
collection_detail_page.unset_on_sale_popup: This collection is available for purchase on in-world vending machines.
collection_detail_page.notice: Cool! Now you can start working on your items. {editor_link} to open the editor or click the edit button on any item.
collection_detail_page.start_adding_items: Looking good! now you can start adding items to your collection.
collection_detail_page.cant_remove: You will not be able to remove or add items to your collection once its published.
collection_detail_page.cant_mint: This collection is still under review, once that process ends you'll be able to mint items

confirm_delete.content: Are you sure you want to delete "{name}"?

publish_collection_modal.title: Publish Collection
publish_collection_modal.first_paragraph: You are about to publish your collection, keep in mind the following things:
publish_collection_modal.second_paragraph: You will not be able to add or delete items after you publish your collection
publish_collection_modal.third_paragraph: You will be able to see your items in the marketplace but they will available for sale once the collection is validated by the DAO

mint_items_modal.title: Mint Items
mint_items_modal.no_items: You have no items available to mint for "{name}"

sell_collection_modal.title: Do you want to sell your items?
sell_collection_modal.turn_on_description: By turning this switch on your collection will be available for purchase in in-world vending machines.
sell_collection_modal.turn_off_description: By turning this switch off your collection will not longer be available for purchase.
